import React from 'react'; import { Form, Field } from 'react-form-ease'; import iconoCerrar from "./CloseIcon.png"; import styles from "./ModalEditar.module.css"; function ModalEditar({ video, categorias, onSave, onClose }) { const initialValues = { titulo: video.titulo, categoria: video.categoria, capa: video.capa, videoURL: video.videoURL, descripcion: video.descripcion || '', }; const handleSave = (values) => { onSave({ ...video, ...values, }); }; return (

Editar Video

); } export default ModalEditar;
